Instructions_title
Welcome to minis duel.
Bienvenue dans le Duel minis.
Willkommen beim minis-Duell.
Benvenuto nel duello minis.
Te damos la bienvenida al Duelo de minis.
Welcome to minis duel.
Welcome to minis duel.
Welcome to minis duel.
Welcome to minis duel.
Welcome to minis duel.
Welcome to minis duel.
Instructions_body_1
The aim of the game is to match pairs of minis tiles. The first player to build up a 5 point gap or finish the board in the lead will be the winner.
Le but du jeu est de faire des paires de cases minis. Le premier joueur à avoir 5 points de plus ou à terminer le plateau l'emporte.
Ziel des Spiels ist es, aus minis-Kärtchen Paare zu bilden. Der erste Spieler, der fünf Punkte Vorsprung hat oder das Spielfeld als Führender abschließt, gewinnt.
L'obiettivo del gioco è abbinare coppie di mini-tessere. Vincerà il primo giocatore che riuscirà a distanziare l'avversario di 5 punti o a terminare il pannello.
El objetivo del juego es emparejar las fichas de minis. El primer jugador que obtenga 5 puntos de ventaja o vaya ganando cuando se vacíe el tablero, se hará con la victoria.
The aim of the game is to match pairs of minis tiles. The first player to build up a 5 point gap or finish the board in the lead will be the winner.
The aim of the game is to match pairs of minis tiles. The first player to build up a 5 point gap or finish the board in the lead will be the winner.
The aim of the game is to match pairs of minis tiles. The first player to build up a 5 point gap or finish the board in the lead will be the winner.
The aim of the game is to match pairs of minis tiles. The first player to build up a 5 point gap or finish the board in the lead will be the winner.
The aim of the game is to match pairs of minis tiles. The first player to build up a 5 point gap or finish the board in the lead will be the winner.
The aim of the game is to match pairs of minis tiles. The first player to build up a 5 point gap or finish the board in the lead will be the winner.
Instructions_body_2
Pick a tile to turn it over. You will find the following:
Choisissez une case pour la retourner. Voici ce que vous trouverez :
Wählen Sie ein Kärtchen aus, um es aufzudecken. Es gibt dann folgende Optionen:
Scegli una tessera per girarla. Troverai quanto segue:
Coge una ficha para darle la vuelta. Encontrarás lo siguiente:

Instructions_body_3
Match two of these to score a point. Play then switches to your opponent.
Associez-en deux pour marquer un point. Jouez puis passez la main à votre adversaire.
Wenn Sie ein übereinstimmendes Paar bilden, erhalten Sie einen Punkt. Dann ist Ihr Gegner wieder am Zug.
Abbina due di queste per segnare un punto. Poi il gioco passa al tuo avversario.
Empareja dos para lograr un punto. Después, será el turno de tu rival.
Match two of these to score a point. Play then switches to your opponent.
Match two of these to score a point. Play then switches to your opponent.
Match two of these to score a point. Play then switches to your opponent.
Match two of these to score a point. Play then switches to your opponent.
Match two of these to score a point. Play then switches to your opponent.
Match two of these to score a point. Play then switches to your opponent.
Instructions_body_4
Reveal this tile and you will be able to take another turn. You will however lose this ability if you reveal a Steal or End Turn tile.
Révélez cette case et vous pourrez rejouer. En revanche, vous devrez passer la main si vous révélez une case Voler ou Passer tour.
Wenn Sie dieses Kärtchen aufdecken, sind Sie noch einmal dran. Allerdings haben Sie nicht mehr die Möglichkeit dazu, wenn Sie ein Stehlen- oder Rundenende-Kärtchen aufdecken.
Se scopri questa tessera, potrai aggiudicarti un altro turno. Non avrai questa possibilità se scopri una tessera Furto o Fine turno.
Descubre esta ficha y podrás jugar otra vez. Perderás la habilidad si descubres una ficha de Robo o Fin de turno.
Reveal this tile and you will be able to take another turn. You will however lose this ability if you reveal a Steal or End Turn tile.
Reveal this tile and you will be able to take another turn. You will however lose this ability if you reveal a Steal or End Turn tile.
Reveal this tile and you will be able to take another turn. You will however lose this ability if you reveal a Steal or End Turn tile.
Reveal this tile and you will be able to take another turn. You will however lose this ability if you reveal a Steal or End Turn tile.

Reveal this tile and you will be able to take another turn. You will however lose this ability if you reveal a Steal or End Turn tile.
Instructions_body_5
Reveal this tile and your turn is immediately over.
Révélez cette case et votre tour est immédiatement terminé.
Wenn Sie dieses Kärtchen aufdecken, ist Ihre Runde sofort beendet.
Se scopri questa tessera, il tuo turno finirà.
Descubre esta ficha y tu turno habrá acabado.
Reveal this tile and your turn is immediately over.
Reveal this tile and your turn is immediately over.
Reveal this tile and your turn is immediately over.

Instructions_body_6
Reveal this tile to automatically match a pair of minis tiles.
Révélez cette case pour faire automatiquement une paire de cases minis.
Wenn Sie dieses Kärtchen aufdecken, wird automatisch ein übereinstimmendes Paar von minis-Kärtchen gebildet.
Se scopri questa tessera, una coppia di mini-tessere verrà abbinata automaticamente.
Descubre esta ficha y emparejarás automáticamente dos fichas de minis.
Reveal this tile to automatically match a pair of minis tiles.
Reveal this tile to automatically match a pair of minis tiles.

Instructions_body_7
Reveal this tile and you will steal a point from your opponent and your turn will end.
Révélez cette case et vous volerez un point à votre adversaire puis passerez la main.
Wenn Sie dieses Kärtchen aufdecken, stehlen Sie Ihrem Gegner einen Punkt, und Ihre Runde ist beendet.
Se scopri questa tessera, ruberai un punto al tuo avversario e finirà il tuo turno.
Descubre esta ficha y podrás robar un punto a tu rival. Tu turno habrá terminado.
Reveal this tile and you will steal a point from your opponent and your turn will end.
Reveal this tile and you will steal a point from your opponent and your turn will end.
Reveal this tile and you will steal a point from your opponent and your turn will end.
Reveal this tile and you will steal a point from your opponent and your turn will end.
Reveal this tile and you will steal a point from your opponent and your turn will end.

Instructions_body_8
Before you start you will be able to place 2 Booby Traps.
Avant de commencer, vous pourrez placer 2 traquenards.
Bevor Sie anfangen, können Sie zwei Sprengfallen setzen.
Prima di iniziare, devi posizionare 2 Trappole bomba.
Antes de empezar, podrás colocar dos trampas.
Before you start you will be able to place 2 Booby Traps.
Before you start you will be able to place 2 Booby Traps.
Before you start you will be able to place 2 Booby Traps.
Before you start you will be able to place 2 Booby Traps.
Before you start you will be able to place 2 Booby Traps.
Before you start you will be able to place 2 Booby Traps.
Instructions_body_9
Remember where you place traps as you will not be told where they are during the game unless you set one off.
Mémorisez l'endroit où vous placez les traquenards, car on ne vous dira pas où ils sont sauf si vous en déclenchez un.
Vergessen Sie nicht, wo Sie die Fallen platziert haben, da während des Spiels nicht zu sehen sein wird, wo sie sich befinden – es sei denn, Sie lösen sie aus.
Ricorda dove posizioni le trappole, poiché durante il gioco saranno invisibili e potrai scoprire dove sono solo facendole scattare.
Recuerda dónde colocas las trampas, ya que no sabrás dónde están durante la partida a menos que las actives.
Remember where you place traps as you will not be told where they are during the game unless you set one off.
Remember where you place traps as you will not be told where they are during the game unless you set one off.
Remember where you place traps as you will not be told where they are during the game unless you set one off.
Remember where you place traps as you will not be told where they are during the game unless you set one off.

Remember where you place traps as you will not be told where they are during the game unless you set one off.
Instructions_body_10
Revealing a tile with a trap placed on it will result in you losing two points, note that your traps will also affect you!
Si vous révélez une case cachant un traquenard, vous perdez deux points. Notez que vous serez aussi touché par vos propres traquenards !
Wenn Sie ein Kärtchen mit einer Falle aufdecken, verlieren Sie zwei Punkte. Das gilt auch für eigene Fallen!
Se scopri una tessera con una trappola, perderai due punti. Tieni presente che sarai colpito anche dalle tue trappole!
Si descubres una ficha con una trampa, perderás dos puntos. ¡Tus trampas también te afectan!
Revealing a tile with a trap placed on it will result in you losing two points, note that your traps will also affect you!
Revealing a tile with a trap placed on it will result in you losing two points, note that your traps will also affect you!

Revealing a tile with a trap placed on it will result in you losing two points, note that your traps will also affect you!
Instructions_body_11
Points deducted are calculated once your turn is complete.
Les points perdus sont déduits une fois votre tour terminé.
Punktabzüge werden am Ende der Runde berechnet.
I punti sottratti verranno calcolati al termine del tuo turno.
Los puntos perdidos se calculan al final del turno.
Points deducted are calculated once your turn is complete.
Points deducted are calculated once your turn is complete.
Points deducted are calculated once your turn is complete.
Points deducted are calculated once your turn is complete.
Points deducted are calculated once your turn is complete.
Points deducted are calculated once your turn is complete.
Instructions_body_12
Traps are cumulative so if you reveal a tile with two traps you will lose four points.
Les traquenards sont cumulatifs. Ainsi, si vous révélez une case à deux traquenards, vous perdez quatre points.
Es können mehrere Fallen auf einem Kärtchen platziert werden. Decken Sie ein Kärtchen mit zwei Fallen auf, verlieren Sie vier Punkte.
Le trappole sono cumulative, quindi se scopri una tessera che ha due trappole, perderai quattro punti.
Las trampas son acumulativas: si descubres una ficha con dos trampas, perderás cuatro puntos.
Traps are cumulative so if you reveal a tile with two traps you will lose four points.
Traps are cumulative so if you reveal a tile with two traps you will lose four points.
Traps are cumulative so if you reveal a tile with two traps you will lose four points.
Traps are cumulative so if you reveal a tile with two traps you will lose four points.

During play you can perform the following actions:
Vous pouvez faire les choses suivantes en cours de partie :
Im Spiel können Sie folgende Aktionen ausführen:
Durante la partita puoi scegliere le azioni seguenti:
Durante el juego puedes hacer las siguientes acciones:

Instructions_body_14
Play this action on a tile to reveal that tile and those that immediately surround it.
Exécutez cette action sur une case pour la révéler ainsi que celles qui l'entourent.
Führen Sie diese Aktion auf einem Kärtchen aus, werden dieses und die benachbarten Kärtchen aufgedeckt.
Gioca questa azione per scoprire una tessera e quelle immediatamente circostanti.
Realiza esta acción con una ficha para descubrirla, así como las que la rodean.
Play this action on a tile to reveal that tile and those that immediately surround it.
Play this action on a tile to reveal that tile and those that immediately surround it.

Instructions_body_15
Any Booby Traps placed within this reveal area will be diffused.
Tout traquenard situé dans la zone de révélation sera désactivé.
Alle Sprengfallen, die innerhalb des aufgedeckten Bereichs liegen, werden entschärft.
Una Trappola bomba posizionata in quest'area verrà estesa.
Las trampas colocadas en esta zona descubierta no tendrán efecto.
Any Booby Traps placed within this reveal area will be diffused.
Any Booby Traps placed within this reveal area will be diffused.
Any Booby Traps placed within this reveal area will be diffused.
Any Booby Traps placed within this reveal area will be diffused.
Any Booby Traps placed within this reveal area will be diffused.
Any Booby Traps placed within this reveal area will be diffused.
Instructions_body_16
Only the person playing the Reveal will see the tiles revealed.
Seul le joueur révélant verra les cases révélées.
Nur wer „Aufdecken“ ausspielt, sieht die aufgedeckten Kärtchen.
Solo chi gioca il Rivelatore vedrà quello che si cela dietro le tessere.
Solo el jugador que utilice Descubrir verá las fichas descubiertas.
Only the person playing the Reveal will see the tiles revealed.
Only the person playing the Reveal will see the tiles revealed.

Only the person playing the Reveal will see the tiles revealed.
Instructions_body_17
Play this action to shuffle a tile and those immediately surrounding it.
Exécutez cette action pour inverser une case avec une se trouvant à proximité.
Führen Sie diese Aktion aus, um ein Kärtchen und die benachbarten Kärtchen zu mischen.
Scegli questa azione per mischiare una tessera con quelle immediatamente circostanti.
Realiza esta acción para mover una ficha y las que la rodean.
Play this action to shuffle a tile and those immediately surrounding it.

Instructions_body_18
This is particularly useful if someone has played a reveal at this location.
C'est particulièrement utile si quelqu'un a joué une case Révéler à cet endroit.
Das ist besonders hilfreich, wenn jemand an dieser Stelle „Aufdecken“ ausgespielt hat.
È particolarmente utile se qualcuno ha giocato un Rivelatore in questo punto.
Es especialmente útil si alguien ha usado Descubrir en ese lugar.
This is particularly useful if someone has played a reveal at this location.

Instructions_body_19
The shuffle location is visible to both players.
Les cases inversées sont visibles par les deux joueurs.
Die Mischstelle ist für beide Spieler sichtbar.
La posizione mischiata è visibile a entrambi i giocatori.
La zona afectada por la reordenación es visible para ambos jugadores.
The shuffle location is visible to both players.
The shuffle location is visible to both players.

The shuffle location is visible to both players.
Instructions_body_20
You can play any number of Reveals and Shuffles during your turn.
Vous pouvez faire autant de révélations et de mélanges que vous le souhaitez pendant votre tour.
Sie können während Ihres Zugs beliebig viele „Aufdecken“- und Mischen-Aktionen ausführen.
Puoi giocare un numero qualsiasi di Rivela e Mischia nel tuo turno.
Puedes utilizar Descubrir y Reordenar tantas veces como quieras durante tu turno.
You can play any number of Reveals and Shuffles during your turn.
You can play any number of Reveals and Shuffles during your turn.

You can play any number of Reveals and Shuffles during your turn.
You can play any number of Reveals and Shuffles during your turn.
You can play any number of Reveals and Shuffles during your turn.
Instructions_body_21
Each player has 30 seconds to make their selections.
Chaque joueur a 30 secondes pour faire sa sélection.
Jeder Spieler hat 30 Sekunden, um sich zu entscheiden.
Ogni giocatore ha 30 secondi per fare la sua scelta.
Cada jugador tiene 30 segundos para hacer sus elecciones.
Each player has 30 seconds to make their selections.
Each player has 30 seconds to make their selections.
Each player has 30 seconds to make their selections.

Instructions_body_22
If no action is performed this player will be removed from the game.
Si aucune action n'est exécutée, le joueur sera éliminé.
Wenn keine Aktion ausgeführt wird, wird dieser Spieler aus dem Spiel entfernt.
Se il giocatore non agisce, allo scadere del tempo verrà rimosso dal gioco.
Si no realiza ninguna acción, el jugador será excluido del juego.

Bonne chance !
Viel Glück!
In bocca al lupo!
¡Buena suerte!
